Package jwrc.game

Class Turn

java.lang.Object
jwrc.game.Turn
public class Turn
extends java.lang.Object
Turn class handles actions which proceed before and after the BoardSpace actions take place. e.g. dice rolled here and post-turn prompts. Player taking the turn can build, sell etc whenever they want during the turn due to the looping menu structure

  • Constructor Details

    • Turn

      public Turn​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> inputCommDeckIndices, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> inputChanceDeckIndices)
      Constructor for the turn object
      Parameters:
      inputCommDeckIndices - shuffled indexes to be used for community chest
      inputChanceDeckIndices - shuffled indexes to be used for chance

  • Method Details

    • movePlayerForward

      public static void movePlayerForward​(Player player, java.util.ArrayList<Player> playerList)
      Safely move the player forward and take the specific action as specified by the space they land on
      Parameters:
      player - current active player whose turn it is
      playerList - list of players remaining in the game

    • tryLeaveJail

      public void tryLeaveJail​(Player currentPlayer, java.util.ArrayList<Player> playerList, int[] diceVal)
      Function where player tries to roll their way out of jail. If they roll double they are free If they have been in jail too long, they are forced to pay fine
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - player whose turn it is (should be in jail)
      playerList - players remaining in the game
      diceVal - integer array of two dice values that they rolled

    • tryPostBail

      public void tryPostBail​(Player player)
      Attempt to pay way out of jail provided balance is high enough. To be accessed from jail menu
      Parameters:
      player - player object who is active. Should be in jail.

    • tryUseGOOJFCard

      public void tryUseGOOJFCard​(Player player)
      Get out of jail by using the Get out of Jail free card - if the player has one
      Parameters:
      player - player who is active - should be in jail
